Package.Name: io.qt
Package.Title: Qt
Package.Description: Qt framework

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio
Package.Title: SQLiteStudio
Package.Description: SQLiteStudio core application

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins
Package.Title: SQLiteStudio plugins
Package.Description: Optional plugins for SQLiteStudio.

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins.configmigration
Package.Title: Configuration migration plugin
Package.Description: Plugin for migrating old SQLiteStudio 2.x.x configuration to current version.

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins.csvexport
Package.Title: CSV Export plugin
Package.Description: Plugin for exporting into CSV format.

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins.csvimport
Package.Title: CSV Import plugin
Package.Description: Plugin for importing data from CSV format

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins.dbandroid
Package.Title: Android plugin
Package.Description: Plugin for accessing Android SQLite databases directly on the Android device from your computer.

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins.dbsqlite2
Package.Title: SQLite 2 plugin
Package.Description: Plugin for SQLite 2 databases

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins.dbsqlitecipher
Package.Title: SQLCipher plugin
Package.Description: Plugin for SQLCipher databases

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins.dbsqlitewx
Package.Title: WxSQLite plugin
Package.Description: Plugin for WxSQLite3 databases

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins.htmlexport
Package.Title: HTML Export plugin
Package.Description: Plugin for exporting into HTML format.

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins.jsonexport
Package.Title: JSON Export plugin
Package.Description: Plugin for exporting into JSON format.

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins.multieditorimage
Package.Title: Image editor/viewer plugin
Package.Description: Plugin that introduces image editor/viewer tab for cell editor and form view.

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins.pdfexport
Package.Title: PDF Export plugin
Package.Description: Plugin for exporting into PDF format.

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins.printing
Package.Title: Printing plugin
Package.Description: Plugin for printing schema, data and queries out of SQLiteStudio.

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins.regexpimport
Package.Title: RegExp Import plugin
Package.Description: Plugin for importing data from any files using Regular Expressions.

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins.scriptingtcl
Package.Title: Tcl plugin
Package.Description: Plugin for implementing functions in SQLiteStudio with Tcl scripts.

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins.sqlenterpriseformatter
Package.Title: SQL enterprise formatter plugin
Package.Description: Plugin for advanced, highly customizable SQL formatting.

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins.sqlexport
Package.Title: SQL export plugin
Package.Description: Plugin for exporting schema and data into SQL/DDL format.

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins.sqlformattersimple
Package.Title: SQL simple formatter plugin
Package.Description: Plugin for limited SQL formatting - only keywords and some of whitespaces. For better experience the enterprise SQL formatter plugin is recommended.

Package.Name: pl.com.salsoft.sqlitestudio.plugins.xmlexport
Package.Title: XML Export plugin
Package.Description: Plugin for exporting schema and data to XML format.
